notes:
Jaul, Protektor Profundis, is one of the three depth lords. Reachable in third stage of [[Liquid Black Quest]], he is the strongest [[Deeplings|deepling]] boss.
"KENH!!" [[Quirefang Library|translates]] to "Intruder!!", and "QJELL AFAR GOU JEY!!" translates to "[[Qjell]] watch over us!!".
{{Seealso|Jaul/Treasure Statistics}}
name: Jaul
behaviour: He combos a lot, walks pretty fast and retargets a lot.
strategy: Get a decent level blocker or two (250+ is enough), one healer for each of the blockers and several damage dealers and just kill it with your strongest attacks. Note that knights are not only meatshields and should also attack as they do high amount of damage too. [[Bronze Amulet]] is recommended because of the manadrain Jaul does.
